history.text: Have you seen Despicable Me? It's a 2010 animation voiced by Steve Carell, Jason Segal and Russell Brand.
Oh really? I like Steve Carell and Russell Brand. Is it a kid's movie?
It's an animated movie but everyone can enjoy it equally.
Do you know if Jason Sega has been in any other films? I don't think I know him
I'm not sure. All I know is that he's fantastic in Despicable Me.
What is the movie about?
It's about a megalomanic rogue name Gru. It received a CinemaScore of A.
Megalomanic? What is that?
Kind of like a villain. It's funnyt and sweet all at the same time.
Do you know what studio made the film?
Is it a Disney movie?
Universal Pictures and Illumination Entertainment made it. It's Illums debut film.
Interesting. Can you tell me the story line?
It was animated by the french animation tudio Mac Guff which Illumination Entertainment bought out.

Gru is the main character. He's a super villain who gets upset when another villain
 steals the Great Pyramid of Giza. He tries everything he can to steal it back.
Two villians? Any super heros in this movie?

That's the whole point of the movie! The villain takes the super hero role. It only scored a 6.8/10 on R
otten Tomatoes which I don't agree with at all.
Steve Carell plays Gru.
Sounds like a really original idea! Can you tell me who does the voice of Gru and the other character names?
You read my mind!!!!
There's even a Pharrell song in it.
Ew LOL. Not a fan. LOL

Are you a Jason Segal fan? He plays Victor
 "Vector" Perkins.
I am not sure that I know him. Do you know any other films he has done?
Hm, not sure. How about Russell Brand? He plays Dr. Nefario.
I do find Russell Brand funny. Is he funny in this movie?
He's one of the funniest. The movie is a comedy mostly but it's heartwarming at the same time. It's cute.
I am curious about the story line.
Sounds cute
Like I said, Gru is a villian. He witnesses an unknown villain steal something and wants to get it back. Gru has to steal other things and his minions (Dr Nefario) have to make a plan.
